title: Cryptoenglish
description:
English is my second language, which will be obvious to readers of this page because sometimes I screw up. It is what it is.

There are people out there that think that the cryptospace is something completely useless, but I must thank it publicly for teaching me things about English that I didn't know before.

For example, there's the word "scam". It's already pretty short, but it turns out one can shorten it even more by writing it as "NFT". Amazingly, when pronounced, the shorter version is longer. Isn't it great?
dc:creator: José María Mateos
